item.title: The Joys of Super Mario Odyssey - Nintendo Voice Chat 379 Teaser

item.title: Shazam! Zachary Levi Cast in DC Movie - IGN News
item.description: Shazam! tells the story of a boy named Billy Batson, who, by simply saying "Shazam!" can transform into an adult superhero. Each letter in the DC hero's name stands for a different god/historical figure—those being: Solomon, Hercules, Atlas, Zeus, Achilles, and Mercury—whose attributes are bestowed upon Bastion when he transforms.

media:content.media:keywords: games, gaming, ign, ign news, breaking news, ps4, xbox one, nintendo, videos games, xbox scorpio, Feature, Shazam, characters

item.title: Publishers Don't Realize Microtransactions Are Hurting Them, Too
item.description: We explore the idea of whether or not the extra money is worth losing customer loyalty.

media:content.media:keywords: Feature, Xbox One, Star Wars Battlefront II, games, Shooter, Star Wars, Electronic Arts, DICE (Digital Illusions CE), PC, PS4, Middle-earth: Shadow of War, Action, Adventure, RPG, Warner Bros. Interactive, Monolith Productions

item.title: Visceral's Star Wars Game Wasn't Canceled Because It Was Single Player - IGN News
item.description: The decision to close Visceral Games and refocus the studio's Star Wars project wasn't made because it was a single-player title, according to Electronic Arts executive vice president Patrick Söderlund. "This truly isn’t about the death of single-player games—I love single-player, by the way—or story and character-driven games," Söderlund told Kotaku. "Storytelling has always been part of who we are, and single-player games will of course continue."

media:content.media:keywords: games, gaming, ign, ign news, breaking news, ps4, xbox one, nintendo, videos games, xbox scorpio, Feature
